metadata.title: Construct lentiviral plasmid library with pooled sgRNAs

annotations.description: We individually cloned sgRNA pairs and pooled them equally to construct a lentiviral plasmid library (Extended Data Fig. 3a,b).
To ensure that lentiviral integration frequency was limited to one per cell, we used a low infection rate of 2.5% (ref. 18) (Extended Data Fig. 3câ€“e).
